snippet.title: Oni 2 (unreleased): Level 1 - The Blast Chambers
snippet.description:
The first level of the cancelled PS2 sequel to Oni. Details here: https://wiki.oni2.net/Oni2AS.  Apologies for the darkness, the game has some lighting issues.  More apologies for the low quality; this footage has been recompressed at least four times from my PS2 to YouTube.

A rare bug appeared in this playthrough that caused Konoko's torso to teleport to another dimension.  I probably should have made another playthrough, but I thought it was pretty funny so I went with this one.

Also, the level is "supposed" to hang at the end.  The boss fight wasn't ready yet, but there are WIP versions of it in other layouts (proto-levels) on the disc.  Screenshots of those layouts are at the earlier wiki link.
